Package org.asteroid.graphics

Class Dialogs

java.lang.Object
org.asteroid.graphics.Dialogs
public final class Dialogs extends Object
Dialogs makes it easy to pop up a dialog box that prompts users for a value, informs them of something, choose file and get other data from the user through GUI

    • askYesNo

      public static int askYesNo(String message, String title)
      Asks yes or no
      Parameters:
      message - Message to be displayed
      title - Dialog box title
      Returns:
      returns -1, 0 and 1 for closing the dialog, choosing yes, and choosing no respectively

    • askYesNo

    • askYesNoCancel

      public static int askYesNoCancel(String message, String title)
      Asks yes, no or cancel
      Parameters:
      message - Message to be displayed
      title - Dialog box title
      Returns:
      returns -1, 0, 1 and 2 for closing the dialog, choosing yes, choosing no and choosing cancel respectively

    • getPassword

      public static String getPassword()
      Shows a Dialog box to accept password. There is a masked password input with the default echo character of JPasswordField
      Returns:
      Password that is accepted

    • getPassword

      public static String getPassword(char echoChar)
      Shows a Dialog box to accept password
      Parameters:
      echoChar - Echo character in the password field
      Returns:
      Password that is accepted

      Returns:

      Returns:

      extension - extension to be filtered out
      Returns:
      Selected file in the instance of java.io.File

      directory - Location of file directory to be shown
      desc - textual description for the filter
      extension - extensions to be filtered out
